full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MNGON PAR RTOGS PA BRGYAD DON BDUN CU DANG BCAS PA'I 'GREL PA NYAMS SU LEN TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,MNGON PAR RTOGS PA BRGYAD DON BDUN CU DANG BCAS PA'I 'GREL NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MDO TZAM DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, MTSUNGS MED BKA' BZHI 'DZIN PA RIN CHEN RDO RJE DANG, SNYIGS DUS KYI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN RENG MDA' BA CHEN PO ZHES GRAGS PA DE NYID DANG, YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I PAndI TA CHEN PO BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL YAB SRAS KYI ZHABS KYI PADMO LA GTUGS PA DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS DBEN GNAS SKYOR MO LUNG DU BKOD PA'O, ,'DIS 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
